trans-unit.source: Defines a method for adding the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> part of the markup to an XPS package.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法，用於將標記的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> 組件新增至 XPS 套件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝，請參閱中的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> element to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> 項目加入至 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 套件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure" /> that represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure" />，表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 封裝中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝，請參閱中的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000)。
